name: Isolated Bug
description:
You are the bug!

You are under the keys of the keyboard!

Human being found you and presses keys randomly!

Survive!!!

Move with WASD

Submission for 20 second game jam

Bug spritesheet

Keyboard SFX

Sad trombone

Homespun Font

Background Music:

"Go Cart"

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
